title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 2210 and H.R. 3218 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
August 16, 2017
On Wednesday, August 16, 2017, the President signed into law:H.R. 2210, which designates the community living center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Butler Township, Butler County, Pennsylvania, as the Sergeant Joseph George Kusick VA Community Living Center; andH.R. 3218, the “Harry W. Colmery Veterans Educational
Assistance Act of 2017,” which amends a number of authorities of the Department of Veterans Affairs related to:  (1) Post-9/11 GI Bill; (2) other educational programs; (3) administration of educational programs; (4) Reserve Component benefits; and (5) miscellaneous provisions.
